name: Daikin Airconditioning Poland sp. z o.o.
membership: Daikin Poland is member of KFCh (Polish Association for Cooling and Airconditioning) , PORT PC (Polska Organizacja Rozwoju Technologii Pomp Ciep≈Ça = Polish Association gathering manufacturers of heatpumps) and APPLiA Polska (European Committee of Domestic Equipment Manufacturers), as well as EHI,EPEE and EHPA (European Heatpump Association) via our mother company Daikin Europe NV.
goal: Keep up-to-date and monitor EU-legislation with regards to energy saving programmes, renewable energies, environmental legislation, performance of buildings regulation and related topics.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
F-gas Regulation (Declaration of Conformity)
WEEE Directive
Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD)
